title: Chapter 736 - The Early Bird Gets The Worm
volume_title: A Sword Suppresses Thirty Thousand Years
body:
Chapter 736 - The Early Bird Gets The Worm

Before Su Yi had time to think, the strange “eye” behind Qing Wan gazed up into the depths of the tribulation clouds overhead.

At that moment, the vortex-like blood-red tribulation lightning suddenly produced a sound that shook heaven and earth.

Immediately afterward, churning blood-red electrical tribulation light poured down like a waterfall, surging into the image of the strange eye.

After absorbing all that tribulation light, the eye shone as dazzling as a miniature sun, then fused into Qing Wan’s elegant figure, bit by bit.

Then, Qing Wan herself burst with radiant light!

Searing light soared into the heavens, dazzling beyond measure.

“This again…” A strange look appeared in Su Yi’s eyes. 

He flipped his palm, and a mysterious soul jade appeared before him.

One surface was carved with a diagram almost identical to the strange eye, while the other side was carved with an elaborate, twisting Edict.

The soul jade originally belonged to Qing Wan. When Su Yi first obtained it, he could tell that it was made of Spirit-Harboring Profound Pith, a treasure of heaven and earth. Furthermore, the Edict and diagram were undoubtedly the work...
original_title: Chapter 736 - The Early Bird Gets the Worm
